bill.title: County courts; create district pilot project.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 9-9-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Create A Multicounty County Court District As A Pilot Project; To Amend Sections 9-9-5 And 9-1-23, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require The Judge For The District To Reside In A County In The District; To Amend Section 9-9-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Address The Salary Of The Judge; To Amend Section 23-15-977, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide The Qualifying Deadline For Candidates For The Judge Of The Multicounty District; To Amend Section 9-1-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Issuance Of Remedial Writs; To Amend Section 9-1-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Address The Practice Of Law; To Amend Section 9-1-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide A Seal For The Court; To Amend Section 9-1-36, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide An Office Allowance; To Amend Section 9-9-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The County Court Shall Convene In Each County Of The District; To Bring Forward Section 9-9-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
